did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 500 items.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fischer Genealogical Worksheets, Accession #1713-k , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was a gift to the Library from Clara (Hamlett) Robertson-Flannagan of Salisbury, North Carolina, on March 10, 1983.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of ca. 500 items, 1963 and 1983, mostly genealogical worksheets prepared and used by Mrs. Myra Fischer for use in her volume entitled Rothwell Book.Also present are three letters pertaining to the content and organization of the worksheets.
